awards.text: Nominated for 6 Primetime Emmys. Another 1 win.

fullplot: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
plot: An authorized documentary on the late musician Kurt Cobain, from his early days in Aberdeen, Washington to his success and downfall with the grunge band Nirvana.
title: Cobain: Montage of Heck
